title: High School DxD EX - Novel Updates
tags: Androids   Angels   Beautiful Female Lead   Demons   Dragons   Fallen Angels   Gods   Magic   Time Travel   Unique Weapons

description: A Spin-off novel of High School DxD by Ichiei Ishibumi bundled with the Blu-Ray special editions of the Season 3 Anime, High School DxD BorN. Set in a time-travel setting between post-Volume 14 present timeline and thirty years into the future.>
